message: Let's start with a fair offer. I believe this split reflects the fact that the money loses value over time, affecting you more than me.
Your previous offer was heavily skewed in your favor considering the inflation. This is a more balanced offer.
Bob, your offer doesn't acknowledge the time pressure we are both under. I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be more equitable.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly. Every round costs us both.
